website_summaries.verdict: Not the latest and greatest, but still one of the best to get the job done.
pros: Runs quietly and stays cool compared to other rack system servers
Wonderfully priced for the power it's packing
cons: Not the latest hardware, so it will require some key updates to improve overall performance

customer_reviews.title: Perfect file server
customer_reviews.text: Great service and speedy delivery exactly as advertised. System works perfect much quieter then expected for a rack mount system usually server room is noisy as hell but this box is quite and stays cool while it serves up my content. Centos 7 loaded flawlessly , only missed step was clearing nvram using switch 6 on motherboard but after that everything is perfect. Well worth the money can’t beat the price for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Steve K.

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, runs well, great service!
customer_reviews.text: Great server to fit my needs for a great price! Had issues with one of the memory slots on the board (cpu2 bay 6 but moved it to slot 9 and all my memory registered). I brought up the issue with StallionTek and received a response next business day with them offering to inspect and or replace the unit/board if necessary. You can get hardware anywhere but good service is hard to come by. Will definitely be purchasing another one in the next couple months.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Jackson

customer_reviews.title: A good workhorse.
customer_reviews.text: So far I have only just looked into the specs, and apparently I didnt get 2x xeon x5650 and 32gb ram, but instead I got 2x xeon x5660 and 28gb ram. I'm not mad, just a bit confused??? Update: I used this server as my main computer for a year or two and it just fine. Some things to note is that certain Windows types won't use both cpu's. I ended up getting Windows 10 ultimate. Since it is a 1U server certain pcie cards won't fit, so I ended up running a pcie extension out of the case to an external graphics card.
customer_reviews.author: Al Magma

customer_reviews.title: Ready for OS installation out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I love the server, came with four drives and all in good, clean and working condition ready for OS to be installed. The hardware is not the latest but great and will serve and be compatible for a long time. So far this unit has been running VMware for a few months and I had zero issues with it. The only regret, I should have bought two from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased, thanks
customer_reviews.text: Very clean and working properly. I updated the BIOS, iLO 3, installed VMware vSphere, and have been running VM's for the last couple days without a hiccup. I am pleased, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: RSail

customer_reviews.title: This is my second DL360 G7 and could not be happier
customer_reviews.text: Received the server in perfect condition. The box was foam injected and even got power supply upgrade to 750w from the advertised 480w. Everything runs great- already did firmware upgrades and installed VMWare ESXi v6.x. I would definitely buy from PC Server and Parts Certified Refurbished again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Added an HDMI GPU card and installed Ubuntu and this is now my primary workhorse. Performance easily outstrips desktop systems costing ten times the price. Perfectly reliable over the six months since I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Arrived and works as expected, very clean inside and as others noted there are updates. When used for development or testing these are good servers, I use them with Ubuntu and MAAS they work flawlessly. I am planning on keeping them for a few years, some extra PS and HDD are also reasonably priced and going to keep them functional.. if you want to put your hands on enterprise-grade gears for the first time here is your chance.
customer_reviews.author: San

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for Cisco Lab studies
customer_reviews.text: Very good price for a used server. Mine came with both 6-core processors and 4x 8GB PC3-10600r sticks of ram. The only difference was 2x 300GB 10k SAS instead of the 4x 146GB SAS. I plan to get two drive sleds and put some data SSDs in the other two slots. Now if I could just find enough ram to quadruple to 128GB for the price of this server. Using mine to run esxi (on an internal SD card) so I can continue doing Cisco la be my environments. Oh and this thing runs pretty quiet, so no problems putting it in the office with you.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service and product
customer_reviews.text: Product came before the expected delivery date and was packaged perfectly. They had run out of the 146gb drives so they replaced them with 300gb drives. Great customer service and will definitely come back when I need to buy another server . Opened the server and it's super clean and looks like it was barely used. Minecraft server is up and running and is working great as a plex server as well.
customer_reviews.author: Stephan Sackett

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that would make this a better buy would be a promotional VMware license. Excellent product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of the same model in order to expand my virtualization infrastructure and this server is amazing! It came as described and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Tofaz

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Affordable price. Kickass customer service. 10 stars.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 22 of these HP servers to handle Email. All I can say is they perform exceptionally well. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Gastelum

customer_reviews.title: came with OS but no password to log in and 2 damaged HD
customer_reviews.text: it was in good condition but 2 drives made some noise and didn't work so will replace them other than that I will replace the drives and see how well it works
customer_reviews.author: BUYER 155

customer_reviews.title: Great value and performance!
customer_reviews.text: I use this server as a media center, router, firewall, ad blocker, minecraft server, arma 3 server, windows 10 VM, file backup server, Debian VM, DNS server, and more... The powerful 24 threads and 32 GB ram makes it ideal for my needs and it does it flawlessly without a sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great server at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great server at a great price. Came quick without issues. I only wish I went with the 8 bay. This is an upgrade that can be installed.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Cameron

customer_reviews.title: RAID I/0 performance
customer_reviews.text: I bought this server from you in june.it is working fine.There s just one problem.This server doesnt have bbwc or fbwc installed.so i my write operations on hdd is very very slow.Do u have fbwc for that server?
customer_reviews.author: Kanan1982

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised, but didn't meet my needs
customer_reviews.text: Device came in and worked well. I did have to update all the firmware for all devices on the server. IT worked and was operational. It just didn't meet my needs like I thought it would. Good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Kammen

customer_reviews.title: Good entry level server
customer_reviews.text: Decent entry level server. Adequate for VM hosting a couple of VM’s.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Clay

customer_reviews.title: Great Server
customer_reviews.text: Using this server as a esxi home lab. It has SATA ports built in too. A+ Server!
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher Craig

customer_reviews.title: I built a learning lab.
customer_reviews.text: A great lab platform, set up a small network with a cisco router, switch, and client PC. ConfigureSystem is a fantastic vendor!
customer_reviews.author: Troy Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great price and actually real
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a scam at first but my gut told me to go ahead and buy it. Now I’m glad I did, great price and came in perfect condition also it was super super clean on the inside like no dust 😱😱😱😱
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price and arrived on time. I've not had any issues thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Dlong

customer_reviews.title: Worked right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the server, it worked right out of the box with no issues at all, and the hardware was just as listed
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great prices. And quick to answer any questions or ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Great prices. And quick to answer any questions or fix any issues... Will buy from ServerPlus 365 again
customer_reviews.author: gary brown

customer_reviews.title: Great seller!
customer_reviews.text: Product was as ordered, got it quick, and at a good price, and works Great!
customer_reviews.author: Donald Amato

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Thanks ConfigureSystem!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered mine from ConfigureSystems, it works extremely well and is a powerful work horse. I will definitely be purchasing another one of these in the future. The packaging was great and the delivery was much faster than the estimate that was 4 days. One of the 4 drives was degraded but that’s fine. Thank you very much ConfigureSystem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: HP ProLiant DL360 G7 1U 64-bit Server with 2xSix-Core X5650 Xeon 2.66GHz + 32GB RAM + 4x146GB 10K SAS HDD, RAID, NO OS
